title: The Blackadder: The Queen of Spain's beard
brief_description: Three hilarious episodes of the well-known BBC series, “Black Adder” feature on this compilation video: “The Queen of Spain’s Beard”; “The Black Seal”; and “Witchsmeller Pursuivant”. Stars Rowan Atkinson with guest appearances by Frank Finlay and Rik Mayall.
